code: function Validation(values){let error={};const e_pat=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;const p_pat=/^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])[a-zA-Z0-9]{8,}$/;if(values.name===""){error.name="Name should not be empty";}else{error.name="";}if(values.email===""){error.email="Name should not be empty";}else if(!e_pat.test(values.email)){error.email="Email didn't match";}else{error.email="";}if(values.password===""){error.password="Password should not be empty";}else if(!p_pat.test(values.password)){error.password="Password didn't match";}else{error.password="";}return error;}export default Validation;
